name: GMB trade union
membership:
TUC, ITUC, ETUC, EPSU, UNI EUROPA, ETF, EFBWW,IndustriALL,EFFAT( Federations at EU and International level)
Member of EESC Group II
goal: To protect and promote the interests of GMB members and their families at national, European and Intenational level,and to work within the International trade union solidarity networks to promote rights, freedoms and decent work and dignity for all.
interests: Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Social and Employment policy, industrial and trade policy, environmental and energy policy, public procurement, tax evasion and avoidance
